Game Theory

We provide some examples of MLPro [https://github.com/fhswf/MLPro.git]’s GT implementation, which is available on our GitHub file.

  • File 06: (GT) Run multi-player with own policy in multicartpole game board [https://github.com/fhswf/MLPro/blob/main/examples/gt/Howto%2006%20-%20(GT)%20Run%20multi-player%20with%20own%20policy%20in%20multicartpole%20game%20board.py]

  • File 07: (GT) Train own multi-player with multicartpole game board [https://github.com/fhswf/MLPro/blob/main/examples/gt/Howto%2007%20-%20(GT)%20Train%20own%20multi-player%20with%20multicartpole%20game%20board.py]

Moreover, you can find the UML diagram of MLPro’s GT funcionalities here [https://github.com/fhswf/MLPro/tree/main/doc/gt].
